txt.en: 'The winter promises to be terrible this year...perhaps we should take advantage of our enemies. The pelts of the Wargs found at the warrens to the north would make good blankets for my people.\n\n'Go to the Warg-warrens and bring me as many pelts as you can. I will have them sent to Forthbrond to be cleaned and sewn.'
'The fur is coarse and uncomfortable, but these pelts will serve both to keep our people warm and to warn the Wargs that we will not tolerate their presence.'
'Have you dealt with the Wargs yet?'
Garrun would like to turn the enemy into an advantage. With winter promising to be cold, he thinks that Warg-pelts might make good blankets for the Rohirrim.
Wargs can be found at the warrens, north and east of Garrun's camp.\n\nGarrun has asked you to collect pelts from the Wargs in the Isendale.
Bring the Warg-pelts to Garrun in the Isendale
Garrun is at his camp, west and south of the Warg-warrens.\n\nYou should bring the pelts you collected to Garrun.
